main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported in South Dakota between November 25-27, 1956.
interesting points: One object was described as baseball-sized and emitted red, blue, green, and white colors., A couple reported seeing a UFO at the same level, two miles away., A police dispatcher photographed a half halo shaped object giving off sparks., Multiple sightings included descriptions of objects hovering and showing fast directional changes., Some observers used binoculars to increase visibility of the sightings over the one and a half hours of observation.
witness description: Housewives and a bank clerk from Kadoka
